description.p: PlantUML QEditor is a simple editor written in Qt5 for PlantUML.
The editor is quite simple: it monitors the editor for changes, and, if any, runs plantuml to regenerate the image.

ul.li: Code assistant to insert ready-made code snipets
Written in Qt5, so it should run on all platforms supported by Qt5 and PlantUML

description.p: The editor also supports an assistant that allows easy insertion of code snippets into the editor. The assistant is defined by a simple XML and a bunch of icons, one for each snippet.
